metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19858 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Platinum Upnp SDK through 1.2.0 has a directory traversal vulnerability. The attack could remote attack victim by sending http://ip:port/../privacy.avi URL to compromise a victim's privacy.

criterions.comment: digikam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
kodi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
